messages.title: Your choice at this election:
messages.content: Strong, stable leadership in the national interest OR A coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn

issues.economy: The risk is just too big to take: higher debt, higher taxes, economic chaos

images.caption: Lindsey Hall - Your local Conservative Candidate for Westminster North

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contrasts strong, stable leadership with a coalition of chaos in the event of Jeremy Corbyn winning. It suggests economic consequences of the latter with phrases like 'higher debt, higher taxes, economic chaos.' The leaflet does not contain any explicit policy details, personal statements, political experience, endorsements, or detailed contact information beyond an email and phone number.
